message.content:
The problem statement appears to be incomplete. To find the value of \( a_2 \) in the given geometric sequence \( \{ a_n \} \), we require additional information, specifically the value of the limit:
\[
\lim_{n \to \infty} \frac{a_n + 1}{3^n + 2^{2n-1}}
\]
Without knowing the value of this limit, we cannot determine \( a_2 \).

\(\boxed{\text{Cannot determine due to incomplete information}}\)
